alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 7:03PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hamilton, Pierce, southeastern Echols, Brantley, central Ware, Wayne, southeastern Clinch, southeastern Appling and northwestern Charlton Counties through 800 PM EST... At 703 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Donald to 10 miles north of Fargo. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Jesup, Jasper, Blackshear, Nahunta, White Springs, Patterson, Fargo, Stephen Foster State Park and Gardi. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
